headline: Textron price target raised to $94 from $90 at Bernstein
summary: Bernstein raised the firm’s price target on Textron (TXT) to $94 from $90 and keeps a Market Perform rating on the shares. Commercial aerospace stocks had an extraordinary year in 2025, and the firm expects 2026 to be another one. For 2026, demand remains very high and should outstrip supply beyond 2030.Claim 70% Off TipRanks PremiumUnlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your

headline: Prent Corporation Named Dove 1 for 2026 Special Olympics Airlift Arrivals, Leading the Way in Championing Athletes’ Journeys
summary: WICHITA, Kan., January 07, 2026--Textron Aviation Inc., a Textron Inc. (NYSE: TXT) company, today announced Prent Corporation will serve as Dove 1 for the 2026 Special Olympics Airlift arrivals, marking the very first aircraft to land at St. Paul Downtown Airport Holman Field on Friday, June 19. This historic arrival will officially launch the nationwide mission to transport athletes and coaches to the Special Olympics USA Games in Minnesota’s Twin Cities.
